mapper.insert: insert into PBCRS_REPORT_BALANCESHEET (BALANCESHEETSEQNO, BALANCESHEETBSSGMTSEQNO, BALANCESHEET2007SGMTSEQNO) values (#{BalanceSheetSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{BalanceSheetBsSgmtSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{BalanceSheet2007SgmtSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update PBCRS_REPORT_BALANCESHEET set BALANCESHEETBSSGMTSEQNO = #{BalanceSheetBsSgmtSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BALANCESHEET2007SGMTSEQNO = #{BalanceSheet2007SgmtSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where BALANCESHEETSEQNO = #{BalanceSheetSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select BALANCESHEETSEQNO, BALANCESHEETBSSGMTSEQNO, BALANCESHEET2007SGMTSEQNO from PBCRS_REPORT_BALANCESHEET where BALANCESHEETSEQNO = #{BalanceSheetSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select BALANCESHEETSEQNO, BALANCESHEETBSSGMTSEQNO, BALANCESHEET2007SGMTSEQNO from PBCRS_REPORT_BALANCESHEET
